item.title: Just Some Pics Of Girls Wearing Yoga Pants To Help Brighten Your Day
item.description: pantso When you think of art, you probably don’t immediately think about the female body, even though it’s what 90% of art throughout history is based on. Sometimes the natural beauty of the everyday real world is right in front of you, possibly in downward-facing dog position. Though we’re not the type to mess with perfection, adding a pair of yoga pants to a beautiful body is an undeniable improvement.
